title: Champ Select Bug

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I was supposed to be in champ select but the screen was blank. I could still click on friends and send messages though. The friends tab said i was in champ select and the screen went back to the home page after the time was up ;(. I got a time penalty for that too.

replies.body:
It looks like you had some issues reaching our matchmaking services. This usually occurs if there are certain network settings that cause an *unstable connection* to these servers. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through the most common solutions for this issue, so I recommend giving those steps a go.

Please let me know if you still encounter this after taking those steps.
